Docs.param: The name of the instance. This name must be unique for each instance of the host.
The path to the Event Hub from which to start receiving event data.
The name of the Event Hubs consumer group from which to start receiving event data.
The connection string for the Event Hub.
The connection string for the Azure Blob storage account to use for partition distribution.

Docs.summary: Asynchronously registers the interface implementation with the host using the factory. This method also starts the host and enables it to start participating in the partition distribution process.
Docs.returns: A task indicating that the instance has started.

Docs.summary: Asynchronously registers the interface implementation with the host using the factory. This method also starts the host and enables it to start participating in the partition distribution process.

Docs.summary: Asynchronously shuts down the instance. This method maintains the leases on all partitions currently held, and enables each instance to shut down cleanly by invoking the method with a object.
Docs.returns: A task that indicates the instance has stopped.
